mapper.select: SELECT article_class.`article_class_id`, article_class_name, COALESCE(SUM(article_view_num),0)article_class_view, COALESCE(COUNT(article_info.`article_id`),0)article_class_num FROM article_class LEFT JOIN article_info ON article_class.`article_class_id` = article_info.`article_class_id` GROUP BY article_class.`article_class_id`
